message: Server URL '/api/v1' at index 0 must be an absolute URL (e.g., start with http:// or https://).
Operation object should contain `summary` field. [path: paths./device.get.summary]
Operation object should contain `summary` field. [path: paths./device/strategy.get.summary]
Info object should contain `license` field. [path: info]
